attributes.additional_details: This is an E petition in support of US 1lt Clint Lorance who was sentenced to 20 years for ordering his men to engage enemy Taliban scouts tracking his men while in the field of combat, This is a personal request to the President Of America to overturn the sentence bestowed in 1lt Clint Lorance and prove that he and the Whitehouse support the work of his own troops in doing their sworn duty
